derivation: (also מָעוּז ); or מָעֹז (also מָעֻז; from H5810 (עָזַז);
outline:
1. place or means of safety, protection, refuge, stronghold
    1. place of safety, fastness, harbour, stronghold
    2. refuge (of God) (fig.)
    3. human protection (fig.)
kjv_def: force, fort(-ress), rock, strength(-en), ([idiom] most) strong (hold).
strongs_def: a fortified place; figuratively, a defence
